mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crawler_hub (hub_url, index_url, article_url_selector, title_selector, article_avatar_img_selector, author_selector, author_avatar_img_selector, content_selector, excerpt_selector, channel_name, theme_name, site_name, is_delete, create_date, is_crawler_content, article_avatar_img_attr_selector, author_avatar_img_attr_selector) VALUES (#{hubUrl}, #{indexUrl}, #{articleUrlSelector}, #{titleSelector}, #{articleAvatarImgSelector}, #{authorSelector}, #{authorAvatarImgSelector}, #{contentSelector}, #{excerptSelector}, #{channelName}, #{themeName}, #{siteName}, #{isDelete}, #{createDate}, #{isCrawlerContent}, #{articleAvatarImgAttrSelector}, #{authorAvatarImgAttrSelector})
